review: Two words: don't bother. Poor performance from the get-go, as sound and picture only erratically matched up, and picture routinely froze and jumped around. Watched a few youtube vids and now returning, as this is a disappointing product. Seems like Google's quality standards for their products is diminishing over time, which is a disappointing sign from a company that looked to be different from the rest. Also, the "feel" of the product is cheap and Chinese-y. Totally not worth $30; maybe worth a few bucks if you find one at a yard sale.

review: Great little add-on to any TV with an HDMI port. Luckily mine has a USB port as well, so it's easy to eliminate the charger. I use this with Plex and it's the greatest thing ever. The ROKU interface is a bit nicer and doesn't require an Android device, but who doesn't have their phone or tablet around all the time anyway? Definitely worth the $30 I paid for it.
author: Dan P "Dan P"

review: I love this product and am shocked that it is so cheap! I stream a lot and this makes it so easy and clean! I hated having to have a bunch of HDMI cords plugged in. The quality is outstanding and the set up is seamlessly easy. The only issue we have had is when setting up the laptop we had to install an addition installer. Phones and tablets take less than 5 minutes before you are ready to use it. I am so impressed with this that I have contacted all my friends about it and some have already ordered and they love it as much as we do!
